headline: A Look At Vulcan Materials (VMC) Valuation As Shares Trade Near Narrative Fair Value
summary: Vulcan Materials (VMC) is back on investors’ radar after a recent 1 day gain of 1.4%, which contrasts with a small loss over the past week and modest gains over the month and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Vulcan Materials. At a share price of $305.97, Vulcan Materials pairs a 4.6% year to date share price return with a 14.1% total shareholder return over the past year, which suggests that momentum has cooled recently while longer term holders have still seen solid gains. If...

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Vulcan Materials (VMC) Reaffirmed Guidance And Data Center Demand Narrative
summary: Vulcan Materials recently reaffirmed its full-year guidance for adjusted EBITDA of US$2.35 billion to US$2.45 billion and announced that its fourth-quarter results, originally flagged for February 17, have now been released, while B. Riley initiated coverage with a positive rating citing the company’s role in key construction markets. An interesting angle is B. Riley’s view that Vulcan could be a key beneficiary of accelerating high-intensity data center build-outs, effectively acting like a...
